content: In Norse mythology, what hammer-wielding god is associated with thunder, lightning, storms, and strength?

In Norse mythology, the hammer-wielding god associated with thunder, lightning, storms, and strength is Thor. Thor is one of the most prominent gods in the Norse pantheon and is known for his bravery and prowess in battle. He is often depicted wielding his powerful hammer, Mjolnir, which is a symbol of his authority and strength. Thor plays a central role in many Norse myths and legends, and his exploits are celebrated in numerous stories and sagas.
